Name: Chlo C
Comment: Had a lovely time at 14 hills. The food was delicious and the staff were so friendly and attentive! Great customer service. Cocktails were of good quality and there was a wide range of choices.We were served by Alex aka Alejandro and he was awesome! 5 stars to him!
Owner Response: None

Name: Matt Coles
Comment: Lovely setting, lovely food, we had lobster and cod and it was perfect. There was a slight issue with music being very loud but it was fixed immediately and didn‚Äôt become an issue again. The staff were all kind and helpful and attentive.We came here for a birthday and they sent us a nice plate with a small cake - that was dairy free/vegan to suit all diets which was a nice touch.The best part was the garden on the rooftop which we were just in time to see the sunset over all of London. A perfect setting for a special evening.
Owner Response: Dear Mr Coles,Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our priority is customer service, and we are ecstatic that we met that mark! Kind guests like you make our job a pleasure. Hope to see you soon.Kind regardsMartina

Name: Catherine Rickard
Comment: Today...  went to 14 Hills for dinner with my husband. Inside the 14 Hills restaurant's decorations were amazing & the sitting spaces are very well organised. Food was delicious & is very well presented. Servers are very attentive, friendly & well manner with their professionalism. Very relaxing atmosphere. Me & my husband really enjoying our evening at 14 Hills. We sure would be back again. Thank you very much for your great service. Highly recommended ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êüëç‚ù§
Owner Response: Dear Mrs Rickard,Thank you  for your feedback!We are thrilled to know that you had a lovely time here at 14 Hills and we cannot wait to welcome you back soon!Kind regardsMartina

Name: Bahar
Comment: This was a very pretty restaurant with good service and tasty food. Has a great view and lovely atmosphere. The waiters/waitresses were extremely friendly and helpful. Parking is restricted in the area within given times but there are boxes in nearby streets. We bought Risotto‚Äôs and Steak which we all enjoyed. I went with family friends to celebrate a birthday (specified it on the booking) and the restaurant was very sweet and surprised us with a birthday plate and candle for the birthday girl. The restaurant was clean and so were the toilets. The toilets have a shared corridor/sink area but ladies and mens have separate cubicles (fyi). Only reason it wasn‚Äôt a 5* for me personally; is the Menu selection. I felt like there wasn‚Äôt too many options to choose from which was a bit of a shame but apart from that, 100% recommend.
Owner Response: Dear B,Thank you for finding the time to leave such a lovely feedback.We are really pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.We hope to see you soon at 14 Hills.You feedback has been passed on to the rest of the staff.Kind regardsMartina

Name: Kibibe Bailey
Comment: 14 Hills is a good spot. Definitely somewhere worthy of date spot or even a casual meeting, which is what I saw there.I went on a Friday afternoon, it was quite busy as I'm guessing it's more work people that finished their working week that filled the place. I'd like to come back here in the evening and maybe more earlier on in the week when it may be a bit quieter.Price points are decent and food is well made and presented.Service was okay. Waiters weren't the most cheerful and smiley to be honest, but maybe, it's been a long week for them.ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èAlso, prepare to have your bag searched airport conveyerbelt style. Very unexpected, but it is what is I guess.
Owner Response: None

Name: Kathy B
Comment: Discovered this by accident but the 14 Hills was great experience, I went for my sister's birthday and she really liked it. The scenery was good, gave (Kew Gardens look/inspiration). The food was really nice, my favourite part was the main course I ordered a cod fish with beans, which was very tasty. My only critique will be the dessert, I wasn't a fan of the mango tarte and jasmine ice cream twist but I wanted to try something new. The upside is the drinks and the service were simply great.
Owner Response: None

Name: Charlotte Fong
Comment: Great views of the city. Above the restaurant is a public viewing deck.Large selection of cocktails, good portion sizes and very attentive staff. Will definitely be back!
Owner Response: Dear Mrs Fong,Thank you for your feedback.We are really happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.We hope to welcome you soon at 14 Hills.Kind regardsMartina

Name: Charisma Mitra
Comment: I‚Äôve heard so much about 14 Hills, the views, the cocktails, the food... I‚Äôve been so excited to try it out!Sadly from the moment I got there I wasn‚Äôt overly impressed with the staff, the front of house staff ignored me for about 5 minutes, when they finally acknowledged me, they carried on with a separate conversation, which was a bit frustrating.We got seated and again there was a long delay before a server came over to greet us etc. This set the tone for the whole evening, everything about the service was very brash and slow. I asked for a blanket as I saw them being handed out to all the women and was told there were none left, yet 2 minutes later I saw another women being handed a blanket. I asked if we could be moved to near a heater IF one became available and the server angrily said ‚Äòwe have none available‚Äô gesturing to the whole dining area. I calmly reiterated my point, and he said yes whilst storming off (he did not let me know when a table came up and I had to be asked to be moved). No one asked us how our starters or mains were, and I had to ask to have our mains cleared (after they were sat for over half an hour) AND to order dessert. Honestly I was so disappointed with the service, however the only saving grace was the food and beverage!The food was lovely, the prawns and the Halibut were cooked to perfection and the balance of flavours were amazing. The cocktails were great too and the bar staff were so friendly and help when choosing a cocktail based on your flavour preference.The views and the decor are incredible and well worth a visit to the top.If the service up their game, this would be an absolutely incredible restaurant!
Owner Response: Dear Charisma,Thank you for your recent visit and for your time taking to write this review;We are sorry to hear about the lack of service you have received, however we are so pleased you did enjoy the food and drinks!Would you be able please to email us at hello@14hills.co.uk so we can investigate this matter further?Thank you kindlyMartyna

Name: Mattia Baldissin
Comment: My dining experience at 14 Hills has been simply unforgettable. Not only has the decor of the restaurant transported me into an idyllic and  beautiful world, with luscious plants adorning the elegant restaurant everywhere, but also the service provided has been exceptional! I want to take the opportunity to thank profusely the waiting staff, from the manager Stefano, who has been simply exquisite and went above and beyond with his service, to the waiter Grober, with his infectious smile, and the delightful receptionist, who has been very smiling and kind and offered me a lovely table with a view of the Thames. In addition, the food was delicious, from starters to mains, from cocktails to wine, everything pleased my palate and made my experience even better. I went to celebrate my 40th birthday with a friend and  I did feel cocooned, spoilt and very special. I was blissfully happy and couldn‚Äôt have started my 40ites in any better way. Thank you so much 14 Hills, I will highly recommend you to everyone I know!
Owner Response: None

Name: Edward Buttery
Comment: Used the private dining room, large table so best suited for 15+ groups. Food, wine, and service we're all excellent. The view is great. A very nice alternative to all the restaurants at the top of the towers
Owner Response: Dear Mr Buttery,Thank you kindly for your wonderful feedback! We are super pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time with us and very much looking forward to welcoming you back soon!best wishes14 Hills team

Name: Paola Cops
Comment: Brunch at the top of the hills. Amazing view of London. You are very close to Tower Bridge,  the Shard and The Sky garden. The staff are polite and professional. Highly recommended If you want to live  a wonderful emotion.
Owner Response: Dear Paola,Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our priority is customer service, and we are ecstatic that we met that mark!Hope to see you soon.Martina

Name: Marke Campbell
Comment: I was pretty much captured and pleasantly surprised , all by the lovely souls that treated me for my birthday here and as to how lovely the staff were.This is a place to celebrate not just a birthday but for all of those good milestones in life ,the food was a blessing upon your palette. The very kind and courteous warm nature of the staff is what makes any establishment of this nature work well , with 14 Hills I can say that this was above the norm and appreciated immensely.Great music that does not overwhelm your conversation and at the same time blesses you with a good atmosphere, this pretty much is a lovely precursor to being able to enjoy the view after your meal on the very top of the building . Seeing the sun grace the sky across the city of London above the restaurant is one to remember , all of this in the midst of calm relaxed conversations all round .Thank you also to the lovely French Senegalese who was very attentive and displayed a huge bout of kindness within her role.Bless you  Mr M Campbell
Owner Response: Dear Mr Campbell,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and share your feedback. Our priority at 14 Hills is customer service, and we continuously work to create good experiences for our guests.Hope to see you soon.Kindest regards,Federica

Name: Lao Karun
Comment: We came for a birthday brunch and the experience was delightful!The first thing that hits you is the atmosphere. Words fail me (which is pretty bad considering this is a review after all) but the best I can give you is instagram-able! In fact I found a few parties doing just that, taking a few snaps.The staff are very good, friendly and attentive. The food tastes as good as it looks and they had a decent selection of drinks.My highlight was the French toast which as you can see was a decent size considering the main. Fluffy and we'll balanced with the apricot compote and honeycomb üçØ üòäI Highly recommend!
Owner Response: Dear Lao,Thank you for such a wonderful feedback! We are absolutely thrilled that you had such a fantastic time with us!We hope to be welcoming you back soon again at 14 Hills and prmose to save some of that amzing French toast for you :)Best wishes14 hills Team

Name: Garth S
Comment: Amazing views and the bar is really nice to sit have have a few drinks.Food is very good, went for brunch. Nice atmosphere and service.Tad pricey due to locations and views.
Owner Response: Dear Garth,Thank you kindly for your wonderful feedback!We are pleased you had a lovely brunch with us and we cannot wait to be welcoming you back soon!Have a lovely Christmas!Best wishesMartyna

Name: Asheesh Gohil
Comment: The food, the experience and especially the view all came together to make a memorable dinner date!Food is outrageously tasty and worth every penny. Can‚Äôt wait to try the rooftop garden which sadly was sealed off upon our visit. I initially booked for that reason but they made up for the disappointment with a great view, impeccable service and yummy food.
Owner Response: Dear Asheesh,Thank you for your recent visit 14 hills and for you wonderful feedback!We very much looking forward to welcoming you back any time soon at 14 Hills!Best wishesMartyna

Name: David
Comment: Reasonably diverse menu for Sunday brunch, very attentive service, delicious and beautifully served cocktails. Definitely Instagram-friendly place in North London.Food wise still not that convincing for the price level.I‚Äôve opted for the butternut risotto which was ‚Äúok‚Äù but still for the presentation of the place (and the price) I‚Äôd expect more exciting gastronomic experience.Service - 5/5Food - 3/5Ambience - 4/5
Owner Response: Dear David,Thank you kindly for your feedback; We are pleased to learn that that you enjoyed the service, cockatils and the ambience, however sorry to learn that the risotto dish was not to your liking;Your comments have been passed on to the team and will be looked into it accordingly!Best wishesMartyna

Name: Mark Blount-Stonham
Comment: We had our summer party here and it was excellent. There's a nice roof garden, fabulous cocktails and a lovely vibe.
Owner Response: Dear Mr Blount-Stonham,Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our priority is customer service, and we are ecstatic that we met that mark!Kind guests like you make our job a pleasure.Hope to see you soon.Kindest regards,Federica

Name: Bozz AS
Comment: Our experience at 14 Hills on the whole was a good one. Reservation was handled correctly, table was ready when we arrived. Service and attention was good. As for food the salad was disappointing as it was nothing special considering the cost for it. The fish dish was very good, tasty and well presented. One thing that could be improved is making sure both the plates and food arrives hot, ours was luke warm. The one major minus for this place is the level of sound. The music being played all thru the evening without a break had a decibel reading of 75 to almost 90 decibels. This made conversation across the table very difficult if not impossible furthermore continuous noise at this level is harmful to all ears so a warning to all especially for those with sensitive ears.
Owner Response: Dear Bozz,Thank you kindly for your honest feedback;We are sorry to hear that the salad wasn't to your liking and you found he music being too loud;We do take our guests feedback very seriously and this helps us very much to improve our food and standards of service moving forwardThank you once againbest wishes14 Hills team

Name: Temi
Comment: Quite a disappointing experience!We came to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Entrance is beautiful and the doorman downstairs even congratulated us. However once we got upstairs to the restaurant the reception made a mistake with our reservation time and gave our table away. Even though we came exactly on time for our booking, we had to sit at the bar and wait for table to become available. That just ruined it for us, as it was such a special moment and they didn‚Äôt even do anything to rectify their mistake. All we got was ‚Äòsorry, that‚Äôs strange, do you mind waiting at the bar?‚Äô. Food was okay, service okay. Overall overpriced for the experience we had. So 1 star for the doorman downstairs, 1 star for the decor.
Owner Response: None

Name: Pedro Duque
Comment: Great cocktails. Good and dessert up to par. Amazing view and great service. Loved it.
Owner Response: None

Name: Trina
Comment: Food took FOREVER to be served. Arrived 12:15 eventually served our main at 13:25‚Ä¶The 50% lunch menu is great but not if other parts of a restaurant experience are lacking.Staff slow and with no sense of urgency.The wait to be offered a drink was far too long - was not a full restaurant at this point. The high top tables constantly knocked by staff working the back wall - really badly laid out space.Food was ok, nothing special.I‚Äôve noticed that other similar reviews have had the response ‚Äòthe past 18 months have been challenging In hospitality‚Äô but I‚Äôm exhausted by this excuse. If you want people to frequent your establishment at the same, if not inflated prices, and add a service charge then it‚Äôs up to you to provide the best experience.Customers can live without spending their hard earned cash at restaurants, but restaurants need customers to survive.
Owner Response: None

Name: David Paterson
Comment: Have been going here for a while. Disappointing that they don‚Äôt have the set menu on the weekend anymore. Food was tasty as always, although my steak today was more medium to well instead of Medium and the staff were not very helpful at all today. No thanks and goodbyes etc. would have second thoughts on returning now.
Owner Response: None

Name: Tanja K
Comment: Fabulous restaurant with fabulous sommelier!We ordered a seafood platter which is more than recommended- super delicious and fresh and paired with champagne and white wine!For the main dish I ordered a meat - which was prepared perfectly and super delicious.Vibes and ambient were amazing!Definitely recommend it
Owner Response: None

Name: Madelaine Warner
Comment: We went for drinks before dinner. It was busy and clearly popular (even on a Monday, which is positive).We sat at a high table which had bag clips to keep valuables safe and off the floor (nice touch). But it did constantly feel like we were in the staff's thoroughfare for the place.The wine list was impressive but pricey. We ordered a bottle that ended up costing quite a lot. Service was really quite slow and the bottle was warm and not really ready for drinking. For all the staff rushing around it seemed hard to get their attention.I would have thought for somewhere priding itself on its wine it would have been more slick with wine ready to serve at the right temperature.I might go back if I were going to try eating there, out of the staff's route, and with more time for my wine to chill, but I won't be hurrying to do so.
Owner Response: Dear Madelaine,Thank you for your comments which are very helpful for us.We will look into where any improvements need to be made and will action them immediately.Regards,Ginny

Name: Jean-Paul Frenett
Comment: Expensive, nearly excellent, but ultimately fails at the essentials.Slow service; starter forgotten, first food took 95 minutes.Inconsistent; starter forgotten, drinks forgotten, generally inattentive through understaffing.Food; hits and misses. Artichoke and buratta a hit, duck rillette a total miss. Lamb hit, burger Miss.The bill; extra bottle of wine added we didn‚Äôt drink.
Owner Response: Dear Jean-Paul,In 2016 the UK public voted for hospitality workers to return to their home country. 5 years on and that is just what has happened...Every restaurant in London is currently significantly under-staffed, yet still needs to keep up with the same amount of clients as they usually would take. It is not a surprise that the level of service across all restaurants has decreased accordingly.We are genuinely sorry if you believe we failed at the essentials, we hope you try us again in the future. Please get in touch with me via call, we would like to make it up to you.Kind regards,Ginny

Name: Kristin Hodgkinson
Comment: A pleasant breakfast brunch with work colleagues. This venue wasn‚Äôt our first choice but as our booking at The Ivy Cafe Marylebone was cancelled due to a gas problem in the kitchen, we were taken here.A lovely choice, great food, very tasty and filling. I could eat this every day! Yum.
Owner Response: None

Name: Noah Pearlman
Comment: My wife I booked Christmas lunch here.. based on a nice lunch she had earlier inThe year and the previous reviews. This was Possibly the worst meal we‚Äôve ever had! The service was also terrible except for a great waitress. See picture of our Christmas pudding!
Owner Response: None

Name: Tina Vilaca
Comment: Contemporaneous clear brightly-lit modern atmosphere restaurant with lovely friendly staff and great food. We had the luck to attend with the 50% discount, which was a big plus -- finally one of us was celebrating his birthday, and we then had 4 flutes of champagne, offered by 28-50 which was delicious and a great start of our super long lunch!Off Oxford Street shopping area, it is a great option for a shopping spree lunch break, or simply meeting up with friends who you hadn't seen in ages, due to covid restrictions, which are now lifting!Loved the visit, would certainly go again soon!
Owner Response: None

Name: Anna Nikolaeva
Comment: A great restaurant for food and for drinks. A great variety of wines and absolutely amazing charcuterie boards. Spend a wonderful evening there, would certainly come back to try more.
Owner Response: Dear Anna,Thank you so much for your 5-star review.Your comments have been passed on to the team who are delighted!We look forward to welcoming you back in the new year.Kind regards,Ginny

Name: Emma Alice
Comment: Love this wine bar & restaurant. The food is consistently fantastic and Chocolate Madeline's are to die for!
Owner Response: Dear Emma,Thank you for your lovely 5-star review.We are so pleased to hear how much you love 28-50 Marylebone.We hope to see you back soon!(P.S The Chocolate Madeleine's are our favourite too!)Kind regards,Ginny

Name: Or Yarimi
Comment: Delicious food and very professional service. Recommended for lunch and dinner.
Owner Response: None

Name: Tracy Jawhar
Comment: Great spot for gossip catch-up, first or second date, or serious business meeting - over nibbles and a great selection of wine.
Owner Response: None

Name: Amberli Ferszt
Comment: Chic restaurant with stunning decor, great music and the most delicious food and drink. To top it off, incredibly kind and attentive service every time you come - they really do make an effort. Dog friendly too! The decor and music mean that even on a Monday or Tuesday night, the vibe is good, without being too loud. Can't recommend enough!!
Owner Response: None

Name: Petros Chrisostomou
Comment: Great little find! The service, food and Jazz/JazzFunk band was 1st class on the night.  Highly recommend!
Owner Response: None

Name: James Yates
Comment: Good food (modest portions - not necessarily a bad thing!), nice wine list and fairly reasonable prices. Good service. Table not too cramped.
Owner Response: None

Name: Jana Abelovsk√°
Comment: ü•©FILLET STEAK with peppercorn sauce and chips - AMAZING! Haven‚Äôt had a steak for more than 4 months and almost forgot what a pleasure it is to enjoy one. Medium-rare (swipe right to see the cut) - juicy, well seasoned. Pure perfection!.ü¶ÄCRAB SALAD - crab is my new seafood favourite and it was combined very well with the mango & avocado puree ü•≠ü•ë.HUMMUS & PITA BREAD - freshly made pita with some paprika flavoured hummus..Selection of ICE-CREAMS and SORBETS üç¶üç®.Strawberry TARTELETTE with vanilla creme patissiere - cherry on top to the perfect lunch üçì.Bottle of Chateau de Candie Viognier - restaurant‚Äôs own produce from the French Alps üçæ.The whole experience was just perfect. From the service to the food and drinks, I was in seventh heaven.Regarding the COVID measures: all the staff were wearing masks, sanitiser at the entrance and near toilets. Most of the tables nicely spread out with outside seating available..Verdict: I can highly recommend for any occasion - you won‚Äôt be disappointed! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Owner Response: None

Name: Anca Capotescu
Comment: Its been the most wonderful experience ever.  Amazing food, friendly staff and excellent location in the heart of Marylebone Village. I would highly recommend this wine bar for gourmet food and wine options.the photos complimet the food but can't really describe how beautiful it tastes üòç
Owner Response: None

Name: Charalampos Triantafyllidis
Comment: Nice wine list, quite extensive.We ordered some cheese, hummous and olives. All were good i would say.Biggest let down was the staff which seemed quite disorganized. Painful to order and even pay. Maybe staff was new.
Owner Response: Dear Charalampos,Thank you for sharing your thoughts on our wine list and food.Service issues and staffing was an easier problem prior to Brexit, but with so few skilled workers in the UK and the British governments refusal to help, running restaurants is the hardest we have ever known it.As a French company who has spent years trying to build a reputation in London, it is deeply frustrating. However, the staff we do have are working so hard despite the difficulties.Once again, thank you for the positive aspects of your review.Kind regards,Ginny

Name: Linn√©a M√§ntym√§ki
Comment: Great food & drinks, lovely staff! Reasonable waiting time. Small place but not too crowded on a friday night:) Would go there again!
Owner Response: Dear Linn√©a,Thank you for reviewing us, we are so pleased you enjoyed 28-50 Marylebone for food and drinks on a Friday night.We hope to see you soon.Kind regards,Ginny

Name: A G.S
Comment: Hugely expensive for a hugely disappointing service and food. The pictures online & the ‚Äúpitch‚Äù must be for a very different restaurant than this place. The service was shocking, 90 minutes from entering to serve main course. The meat (steaks) was cold and overcooked on the outside, red raw on the inside, while the vegitarians option (Savoy cabbage and mushroom sauce), was a veg spring roll, effectively, served as a main course for ¬£17! We didn‚Äôt pay service charge & judging by the look on the girls face, this wasn‚Äôt the first time that had happened. There were 3 other tables to serve in the whole restaurant and they had one waitress. Appalling. Do not go. Visit the exquisite delamina opposite.
Owner Response: None
